OOC: There you have it. Teufel (YAY!) always writes the most descriptive an=
d thought provoking posts, OOC or IC. As for me, well, you can't fight City=
 Hall, it's apparent that it's impossible to win, so I'm going to stop comp=
laining in 3, 2, 1... Hi there! I'm a  guy who can't make polls in NBW. Why=
? Oh, some guy named Dewboy did something dumb. Yeah, he attacked Legendary=
 Nemasis for no reason...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: KSLawDog=
g@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, May 06, 2002 11:37 =
PM
  Subject: Re: New poll for nbwrpg


  (I agree, comparing Rauq (I know =
it's spelled rAuq but dangit, that's not 
  correct spelling and I'll never=
 spell it that way!  Except...for what I just 
  did now...dang...) to Zard=
us is just wrong and shameful.  That is an insult 
  reserved for the lowli=
est of men (good thing Zardus doesn't read these posts, 
  eh?).  But I hav=
e to agree with uh...Hollywood Narrator, I think that's what 
  his moniker=
 is-- *stops to watch the pigs fly* Shouldn't we vote on who the 
  new Cou=
ncilmember is?  I mean, sure, we'd all agree you should kick Crow Lord 
  o=
ut because he's a lazy bumb.  Sure you could replace him with Azure, hell, =
I 
  thought he WAS a Councilmember, but the point is the PRINCIPLE.  The C=
ouncil 
  was made to service the people.  A restriction of power and all t=
hose other 
  anti-fascist gobbledygook, which is strange since a Russian f=
rom MOSCOW made 
  up those rules...seems fishy to me...

  <<Kyle does ten=
d to abuse the polls more than others, and that change 
   of rules does af=
fect him more than others, but any member of the rpg 
   who wants a poll, =
ANY poll, can still email it too me, and i'll put 
   it up quickly. Trilli=
an (my chat prog) tells me when I have mail, 
   thus allowing me to hop on=
 my comp and create a poll at any time.>>

  Well, you see, there's the who=
le "the whole being punished because of one" 
  thing I was babbling on abo=
ut.  It'd be much faster for US to make the poll 
  we want.  Plus if by so=
me amazing act of whatever primitive god(s) are out 
  there we make a poll=
 that is ingenious we're going to want credit for it, 
  instead of a big o=
l' "Made by Rauq" slapped on the poll.  

  And please, United States Presi=
dents are not tyrannical...well...the 
  Democrats are but the Democrats ar=
e widely known as IDIOTS and LOSERS and 
  people who mess with Microsoft a=
nd SCREW US with stock over in the long run 
  and cost us hundreds of thou=
sands of dollars because of some BS 
  antitrust/monopoly case that makes m=
e want to puke and beat the hell out of 
  Clinton!  Errr...uh...moving on.=
..if Gore was President instead of Bush, I 
  doubt we would've gone to Afg=
hanistan because those Democrats are tree 
  hugging hippies, they would've=
 just lobbed some more cruise missiles.  But 
  ha, we showed the Talibs!  =
Oooh...I guess you getting America caught in a 
  bloody ground war worked =
out REEEEEEAAAAL WELL, didn't it?!  HAHAHAHAHA!
   
  Uh...that's about all=
 I have to say (Democrats suck!).  It's probably obvious 
  this is not as =
well written and planned out as my last e-mail which was 
  beautiful, but =
I wasn't listening to Iron Maiden and Rammstein when I wrote 
  the first o=
ne and coincidentally all the rage came out.  But I doubt the 
  music has =
anything to do with it... (KILL!  KILL!  KILL!)

  -Teufel
  (Oh, dont' wor=
ry about not being able to remember my new name Narrator, I 
  mean I'd mak=
e fun of you but I don't even know how to pronounce 
  it...so...yeah...)

=

terms/
